title: User can perform an Advanced Search
custom_steps:
1.Log into Ebis as any user
Click on Search from left Nav panel
Add a New Filter, click Add Filter
Click Search button
Click Save Search
custom_expected:
Home dashboard loads.
Action will take you to Advanced Search
Filter will appear in box below
Search results that fit criteria will display below.
Textbox will appear requiring you to name your search

title: User can Save A Search
custom_steps: Type in name you want to save search as and click green checkmark
custom_expected: Blue notification will inform your search has been saved and it will appear top right dropdown as a search option.

title: User can remove a saved Search
custom_steps: Click remove filters link from right hand corner
custom_expected: All filters will be removed from searchbox.

title: User can perform Quick Searches
custom_steps:
Enter text on Quick Search from upper right hand corner
Click on a match
Click on downward arrow on quick search box
Select one of dropdown options (i.e. school, teamÉ)
Enter text on Quick Search from upper right hand corner
custom_expected:
Typing in 3-4 letters will auto populate any matches
Player profile should open
Dropdown options should appear as:players, scouts, schools, teams, intl players as search criteria
Gray text in search box should say "Search school, team, etcÉ)
Drop down list of corresponding searches should display. Should also auto-populate after entering a few letters.

title: User can sort through any widget
custom_expected: Column should be sorted alphabetically. Click it will reverse the sort from descending to ascending or vice versa.

title: User can filter any widget
custom_steps:
Click on filter icon from widget top right corner
Select type to filter
Select column to filter
Apply and Reset buttons
custom_expected:
Dropdown appears with "Type to Filter" textbox, "Select column to filter" textbox, and "Apply" and "Reset" buttons
Allows user to input filter type and sorts data accordingly.
Allows user to select the column they wish to filter by.
Allows user to either apply the filter and sort the data or to reset the filter and start fresh.

title: User can choose to hide/show left navigation
custom_steps: Click Toggle Main menu button on top left corner of page.
custom_expected: Left Nav will be hidden. Clicking button again will prompt left nav to display again

title: User can shift click to open items in a new window
custom_steps: From any widget, hold down SHIFT button and click on Players name
custom_expected: Players profile should open in a new tab.

title: User can export widgets to Excel or PDF documents
custom_steps:
Click on gear icon from upper right corner of widget
Click export to PDF
Click Export to Excel
custom_expected:
Settings menu will open
Widget Data should export on PDF file
Widget Data should export to an excel file.

title: User can tear out widgets to view them on a new page
custom_steps:
Click on gear icon from upper right hand corner of widget
Click on Tear out option
custom_expected:
Settings menu will open
New Window will open will only selected widget

title: User can utilize Feedback button to send feedback to Ebis2 Support group
custom_steps: Click Feedback from left nav panel
custom_expected:
New window will open up in email format, prefills some text in email
*Note : Do not actually send the email

title: User can generate a BI report
custom_preconds: This test case must be run on Firefox. BI does not work well on Mac/Chrome
custom_steps:
Login as any user
Click On Reporting from the left nav menu
Click on any report name and wait for the new window to open and load
Enter in required filters (Date Ranges, Eligible years, etc)
Click "Run Query" Button
custom_expected: This will generate a printable report
